title: Improve machine OEE by using data analysis
description: Detect the failure and downtime to improve overall equipment efficiency.

title: Monitor and analyze machine performance
description: Real time monitoring of machine performance by using SPC (Statistical Process Control)  concept.

title: Machine learning for part quality control
description: Improve efficiency and productivity of visually inspect incoming part.

title: Machine auto triggering
description: Auto triggering if machine operates abnormal which can impact to quality issue.

title: Improve calibration process
description: Save cost 317,600 baht per year and save lead time to 2 hours per item (total 3,380 hours).
